entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Temperature steady near minus 5 except low minus 12 inland.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 5 except low minus 12 inland. Forecast issued 03:12 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 03:12 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 4.
